Posts.Content: Please see your GP ASAP.  This happened to me 11 months ago and unfortunately it was lobular Breast cancer   Drs caught it early. I had to have a mastectomy. I also underwent immediate reconstruction.  Yours may not be BC but get it checked by Medical expert who will be able to put your mind at rest. I am cancer free now and enjoying life again  Best of luck. Keep me updated  Report Reply

Posts.Content: Thankyou for answering yes I will definately go to see the Gp next week hope you are doing ok and yes I will keep you updated  Report Reply

Posts.Content: Sorry if I haven't posted in correct forum I noticed yesterday that my nipples are inverted one is worse it looks as if there's a line where the nipple should be I'm post menopausal no pain nothing but doesn't look right is this a sign of breast cancer should I see a dr I'm 60 0 likes, 3 replies Report
